carousel_items: Carry your rescue inhaler with you at all times to stop an asthma attack.
Wait at least one minute between sprays.
Wash the mouthpiece at least once a week.
Talk to your doctor if you're using this more than prescribed or expected.
Can cause heart racing, headache, and chest pain.
If you're having to use your rescue inhaler more than twice a week, you might need an additional medication to control your asthma better.

basics.benefits_moa: Albuterol is a bronchodilator. It relaxes the muscles that tighten your lungs during an asthma attack. This opens airways and makes breathing easier.
basics.bottom_line: Albuterol is good at stopping asthma attacks and helping you breathe.
downsides: Can make your heart race temporarily.

downsides_processed.orig: Can make your heart race temporarily.

upsides: Can also help prevent asthma attacks caused by exercise.
While there are technically no generic versions of Albuterol, there are many competing brands, which keeps prices pretty low.

upsides_processed.orig: Can also help prevent asthma attacks caused by exercise.
While there are technically no generic versions of Albuterol, there are many competing brands, which keeps prices pretty low.

userStories.tip: You may need a longer acting inhaler
I found Symbicort far better as a longer acting preventor and not as much ventolin required with that.
Take it in the morning if you can. If you take it at night, there's a chance that your heart will beat faster inducing insomnia.
Take if after interaction with cat or when sick with chest cold.

drugs.name: Albuterol

carousel_items_processed.orig: Carry your rescue inhaler with you at all times to stop an asthma attack.
Wait at least one minute between sprays.
Wash the mouthpiece at least once a week.
Talk to your doctor if you're using this more than prescribed or expected.
Can cause heart racing, headache, and chest pain.
If you're having to use your rescue inhaler more than twice a week, you might need an additional medication to control your asthma better.

risks_warnings.title: Worsening of asthma attack
risks_warnings.description: Rare reports of worsening asthma attacks have been reported when people start a new canister of Albuterol for the first time. If this happens, call 911 or your doctor immediately.
risk_factors: Using new canister for the first time

description_processed.orig: Rare reports of worsening asthma attacks have been reported when people start a new canister of Albuterol for the first time. If this happens, call 911 or your doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Worsening asthma
risks_warnings.description: If you find that you are having to use Albuterol more often to control your asthma, talk to your doctor as they may need to consider alternative or added therapies.

description_processed.orig: If you find that you are having to use Albuterol more often to control your asthma, talk to your doctor as they may need to consider alternative or added therapies.

risks_warnings.title: Increased risk for colds and flu
risks_warnings.description: People on Albuterol have reported getting colds and the flu more often. If this bothers you, talk to your doctor.

description_processed.orig: People on Albuterol have reported getting colds and the flu more often. If this bothers you, talk to your doctor.

points.name: Hoarseness
points.hlt: upper respiratory tract signs and symptoms

carousel_items: Take it once a day to control asthma and allergy symptoms.
If you're using it for asthma or allergies, take it in the evening.
Granules can be taken by mouth or dissolved in liquid or soft food.
Doesn't treat sudden wheezing or asthma attacks once they start. Keep a fast-acting (rescue) inhaler with you.
The chewable tablets contain aspartame, so don't use them if you have a sensitivity to phenylalanine or phenylketones.

clock.tip: Works slower when taken with food.
Works slower when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Montelukast is a leukotriene inhibitor. It lowers inflammation in your lungs and nasal passages to prevent asthma and relieve allergies.
basics.bottom_line: Montelukast has fewer side effects but doesn't work as well as steroid inhalers for asthma. It also helps with allergies.
downsides: You have to use Montelukast every day to control your symptoms.
Somewhat less effective than corticosteroid inhalers for asthma.
There's no generic available, so it can be expensive.
Can cause behavior changes, agitation, aggression, and difficulty sleeping for some people.

downsides_processed.orig: You have to use Montelukast every day to control your symptoms.
Somewhat less effective than corticosteroid inhalers for asthma.
There's no generic available, so it can be expensive.
Can cause behavior changes, agitation, aggression, and difficulty sleeping for some people.

upsides: Prevents symptoms and improves lung function in children and adults with chronic asthma.
A single 10 mg dose improves exercise-induced asthma symptoms for up to 24 hours.
Fewer side effects compared to other asthma treatments.
Effective pill alternative to corticosteroid inhalers.

upsides_processed.orig: Prevents symptoms and improves lung function in children and adults with chronic asthma.
A single 10 mg dose improves exercise-induced asthma symptoms for up to 24 hours.
Fewer side effects compared to other asthma treatments.
Effective pill alternative to corticosteroid inhalers.

userStories.tip: I was using many years. In 2005 I had a bleeding episode that could have been a side effect. in 2012 I had my first seizure and decided to read all my med labels. I quit Singular that day.

My daughter was prescribed Singulair when she was six. Horrible side effects to mental and cognitive functioning. Learned after the fact some singular has similar effects on other kids. Parents beware.
I can't take inhaled corticosteroids to control my asthma. This has worked quite well meanwhile..

I wish I hadn't let the fear of the depression side effect prevent me from taking singular for so long,  it works where inhalers do not work for me, and it controls my asthma well in generic montelukast form or Singulair form.
Don't skip a day because it isn't fast acting.  My cat allergies act up for days after being near a cat.

My insurance refuses to cover Singulair, but the generic form doesn't seem to control my asthma as well. One of my pharmacists told me this was the case for himself as well, and that generic was better just for allergies. Singulair is $$$
Caused major depression and angry outbursts which is very unusual for me. I ended up taking half dosage along with St Johns Wort to balance.

For the first several months I did not follow the instructions and took it in the morning (alongside Allegra, Zyrtec, whatever I was using at the time). Now I take it at night and it's far more effective for managing asthma symptoms.
Works perfectly without any side effect, just one pill before going to bed.
I take it at night, along with 2 puffs of Symbicort 80/4.5mcg

drugs.name: Singulair

carousel_items_processed.orig: Take it once a day to control asthma and allergy symptoms.
If you're using it for asthma or allergies, take it in the evening.
Granules can be taken by mouth or dissolved in liquid or soft food.
Doesn't treat sudden wheezing or asthma attacks once they start. Keep a fast-acting (rescue) inhaler with you.
The chewable tablets contain aspartame, so don't use them if you have a sensitivity to phenylalanine or phenylketones.

risks_warnings.title: Sudden onset of asthma
risks_warnings.description: Montelukast is not used to treat sudden wheezing or asthma attack. You should have a fast-acting (rescue) inhaler with you all the time especially if you are prone to asthma during exercise. Talk to you doctor if your symptoms do not improve or seem to worsen while taking Montelukast.

description_processed.orig: Montelukast is not used to treat sudden wheezing or asthma attack. You should have a fast-acting (rescue) inhaler with you all the time especially if you are prone to asthma during exercise. Talk to you doctor if your symptoms do not improve or seem to worsen while taking Montelukast.

risks_warnings.title: Aggression and agitation
risks_warnings.description: Rare cases of behavior changes occur in adults and children taking Montelukast. Symptoms range from irritability and memory problems to hallucinations and suicidal thinking. It is not clear if this is linked to history of these conditions. Get medical help immediately if you notice symptoms of agitation, aggression, sleep disturbance, or suicidal thoughts while taking Montelukast.

description_processed.orig: Rare cases of behavior changes occur in adults and children taking Montelukast. Symptoms range from irritability and memory problems to hallucinations and suicidal thinking. It is not clear if this is linked to history of these conditions. Get medical help immediately if you notice symptoms of agitation, aggression, sleep disturbance, or suicidal thoughts while taking Montelukast.

risks_warnings.title: Blood disorder (eosinophilia)
risks_warnings.description: There are reports of a blood disorder in people taking Montelukast. It's not clear what the link is between this blood vessel condition and Montelukast. Talk to your doctor if you notice red patches/rash or skin color changes on lower legs, numbness/tingling, or worsening of your asthma symptoms. You may need to stop taking Montelukast.

description_processed.orig: There are reports of a blood disorder in people taking Montelukast. It's not clear what the link is between this blood vessel condition and Montelukast. Talk to your doctor if you notice red patches/rash or skin color changes on lower legs, numbness/tingling, or worsening of your asthma symptoms. You may need to stop taking Montelukast.

risks_warnings.title: Brain damage from too much phenylalanine
risks_warnings.description: Montelukast contains aspartame (phenylalanine). People who have phenylketonuria (PKU) can't break down the amino acid phenylalanine. It builds up and causes serious medical problems. If you have PKU, don't use this product.

description_processed.orig: Montelukast contains aspartame (phenylalanine). People who have phenylketonuria (PKU) can't break down the amino acid phenylalanine. It builds up and causes serious medical problems. If you have PKU, don't use this product.

risks_warnings.title: Liver damage
risks_warnings.description: There are reports of liver injury in people taking Montelukast mostly in combination with other factors such as drugs, alcohol, and liver disease. If you have any of these risk factors, your doctor will need to check your liver function periodically.
risk_factors: History of liver disease including hepatitis
Other medications that cause liver injury

description_processed.orig: There are reports of liver injury in people taking Montelukast mostly in combination with other factors such as drugs, alcohol, and liver disease. If you have any of these risk factors, your doctor will need to check your liver function periodically.

carousel_items: Can cause nervousness, fast heartbeat, lightheadedness, and dry mouth.
If your asthma symptoms are getting worse, dont take more tablets. Talk to your doctor about how to better control your asthma.
Take Terbutaline regularly to prevent asthma attacks. It doesn't work right away, so it won't control an asthma attack immediately.

basics.benefits_moa: Terbutaline is a bronchodilator. It relaxes the muscles in your lungs to open airways and make breathing easier.
basics.bottom_line: Terbutaline is effective at preventing asthma attacks, but isnt the first choice. Its generally well-tolerated, but let your doctor know if you feel more lightheaded or have a rapid heartbeat while taking this medicine.
downsides: Can raise your blood sugars. If you have diabetes, check your sugars regularly and let your doctor know if theyre higher than usual.
Takes about 30 to 45 minutes to start working, so it wont help an asthma attack once it starts.

downsides_processed.orig: Can raise your blood sugars. If you have diabetes, check your sugars regularly and let your doctor know if theyre higher than usual.
Takes about 30 to 45 minutes to start working, so it wont help an asthma attack once it starts.

upsides: Terbutaline is effective at preventing and reversing constriction in the airways due to asthma, bronchitis, and emphysema.
Good choice for asthma if you find it hard to use inhalers properly.

upsides_processed.orig: Terbutaline is effective at preventing and reversing constriction in the airways due to asthma, bronchitis, and emphysema.
Good choice for asthma if you find it hard to use inhalers properly.

drugs.name: Terbutaline

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause nervousness, fast heartbeat, lightheadedness, and dry mouth.
If your asthma symptoms are getting worse, dont take more tablets. Talk to your doctor about how to better control your asthma.
Take Terbutaline regularly to prevent asthma attacks. It doesn't work right away, so it won't control an asthma attack immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Bronchospasm (difficulty breathing)
risks_warnings.description: Even though Terbutaline is used to treat asthma, sometimes it can actually make peoples airways more cramped, so its harder to breathe. If you're feeling short of breath and it's not going away, seek medical attention immediately.

description_processed.orig: Even though Terbutaline is used to treat asthma, sometimes it can actually make peoples airways more cramped, so its harder to breathe. If you're feeling short of breath and it's not going away, seek medical attention immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Hypersensitivity (allergic) reactions
risks_warnings.description: Some people who take Terbutaline have had allergic reactions to it. If you start getting hives, a rash, swelling of the face, and find it hard to breathe, seek medical attention immediately.

description_processed.orig: Some people who take Terbutaline have had allergic reactions to it. If you start getting hives, a rash, swelling of the face, and find it hard to breathe, seek medical attention immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Cardiovascular (heart) disease
risks_warnings.description: Terbutaline may raise your blood pressure, heart rate, and affect your heart rhythm. Let your doctor know if you start experiencing more rapid heartbeats.

description_processed.orig: Terbutaline may raise your blood pressure, heart rate, and affect your heart rhythm. Let your doctor know if you start experiencing more rapid heartbeats.

risks_warnings.title: Premature labor
risks_warnings.description: Sometimes people will use Terbutaline to prevent premature labor. This purpose has not been FDA-approved and should not be used beyond 48-72 hours. Serious reactions, including death, high blood sugars, low blood potassium, and abnormal heart rhythms have happened to pregnant women who were given Terbutaline for premature labor.

description_processed.orig: Sometimes people will use Terbutaline to prevent premature labor. This purpose has not been FDA-approved and should not be used beyond 48-72 hours. Serious reactions, including death, high blood sugars, low blood potassium, and abnormal heart rhythms have happened to pregnant women who were given Terbutaline for premature labor.
